description: Tankard, ceramic with pewter mounts, body sprayed with purple, reserved panel on front and borders top andbottom, cartouche panel bears bird and flower design painted in blue on white, shaped borders blue with conventionalized flower design, pewter base and shallow domed lid, thumbpiece a molded flattened ball with round finial, marks on bottom of tankard in blue under glaze, German XVIIIc NO DIMS ON CAT. CARDS
title: Tankard
